name: Keyboard Warrior: Dreamstate (Complete Demo)
description:
Controls are listed at the bottom of the screen when getting into a match. 

Use your dash/teleport ability to start the game once you've read them.

Enemies predict your movement and the game gets pretty crazy really fast, so be warned.

Don't forget to press tab and try out some new terminal commands every once and a while!

Have fun!

Looking for a Steam Version? The Steam version has a bigger shop, more characters, another arena, 30 more songs for the jukebox, 50 achievements, and better performance/graphics (HTML's fault, sorry!). Check it out!
